message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to discuss the product with you! I'm willing to sell it to you for $90.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $75. Can you meet me at that price?
I understand your offer, Bob, but I'm willing to meet you halfway. I can do $82.50 for the product.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I was thinking more along the lines of $78. Can you do that for me?
I'm getting close, Bob! I can do $81 for the product. That's as low as I'm willing to go.
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but I was thinking more along the lines of $77. Can you do that for me?
I'm not willing to go any lower, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $80. That's my final offer.
I appreciate your final offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $79. Can you do that for me?
I'm not willing to budge from my final offer, Bob. I'm sticking with $80. That's the best I can do.
I understand you're sticking to your final offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $79.50. Can you do that for me?
